seniority_level.evidence: 1+ years of experience and responsibilities suggest mid-level role. 'Specialist' title also aligns with mid-level.

job_family.evidence: Title is 'AI Data Engineer', core responsibilities revolve around data pipelines and model deployment.

sub_specialty.evidence: Focus on deploying AI models on Azure, automating workflows, and integrating APIs points to ML infrastructure.

leadership_expectation.evidence: Collaboration with senior AI developer suggests individual contributor role, no direct reports mentioned.

primary_cloud.evidence: Azure services (Azure ML, Microsoft Fabric, Azure DevOps) are explicitly mentioned.

processing_paradigm.evidence: Preparing and transforming data for model training suggests batch processing.

orchestrator_category.evidence: Azure DevOps is mentioned, indicating a cloud-native orchestration approach.

storage_layer.evidence: No specific storage layer technologies are mentioned.

remote_restriction.evidence: Hybrid work model is mentioned, but no specific location restrictions.

timezone_focus.evidence: Location is Prague, Czechia, indicating a European focus.

relocation_required.evidence: No relocation package or requirement is mentioned.

opt_cpt_friendly.evidence: No mention of student visas or OPT/CPT.

citizenship_required.evidence: No citizenship requirements are explicitly stated.

w2_vs_1099.evidence: Permanent contract type suggests a W2 employment.

benefits_level.evidence: Extensive list of benefits mentioned (meal allowance, insurance, loans, etc.).

growth_path_clarity.evidence: Mentions 'focus on your development' and 'boost your potential' but lacks specific career tracks.

mentorship_signals.evidence: Collaboration with senior AI developer suggests learning opportunities.

promotion_path_mentioned.evidence: No explicit mention of promotions or advancement.

internal_mobility_mentioned.evidence: No mention of internal transfers or role changes.

career_tracks_available.evidence: Focus on individual contributions and AI expertise suggests an IC track.

requirement_strictness.evidence: Mix of 'must-have' skills (Python, SQL, Azure) and softer skills.

scope_definition.evidence: Job description focuses on AI data engineering tasks.

skill_inflation_detected.evidence: Skills align with a mid-level data engineering role.
